channel.title: When i jar my client, it shrinks
channel.description: When i jar the my client ive been working on, and then i run the .jar, The client gets smaller. Its not a lot smaller but it cuts off the logout button at the top. how do i fix this? It also cutts off the options i have set like: "Forums, Donate, Vote, Item List, Ect."

item.title: When i jar my client, it shrinks
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

The buttons are your gui buttons.

Not entirely sure what causes that…it happens with a client of mine as well. Try to jar just the client class and load the game. (probably won’t work )

Read full topic
item.source: When i jar my client, it shrinks
